did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Unpublished newsletter of the Liberal Club, formed by University of Arizona students in 1934 to discuss social, economic, and political issues. Eight issues of unpublished newsletter consisting of typewritten articles, newspaper clippings, and political cartoons, Feb. 17, 1936 to Apr. 27, 1936.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: The Liberal Forum (AZ 240). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of the Club, 1936.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Unpublished newsletter of the Liberal Club, formed by University of Arizona students in 1934 to discuss social, economic, and political issues.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Eight issues of unpublished newsletter consisting of typewritten articles, newspaper clippings, and political cartoons, Feb. 17, 1936 to Apr. 27, 1936. Inventory available in the library, folder level control.
